title: Backend Engineering
description: Designing RESTful APIs, microservices architecture, and data processing pipelines. Experience with high-traffic systems, caching strategies, and database optimization.

title: System Architecture
description: Architecting distributed systems for scalability and reliability. Focus on event-driven architecture, load balancing, and fault tolerance patterns.

title: AI Vision Computing
description: Implementing computer vision solutions using YOLO object detection, developing data annotation workflows, and training custom models. Integrating AI capabilities into production systems.
